name: Lab Coat
description: The basic style of lab coat worn by the evil scientists around here. Has two big pockets.

name: Tactical Vest
description: A tough vest with lots of pockets

name: Light Jacket
description: A basic jacket with a few big pockets

name: Rubber Jacket
description: A jacket that doesn't conduct electricity, but doesn't protect from much else

name: Leather Armor
description: This is a roguelike, what more do you want?

name: SWAT Helmet
description: A sturdy helmet commonly used by militarized police forces (this item is likely OP)

name: Gas Mask
description: A mask that covers your face and isolates you from airborne weapons. This game doesn't have any of those so it's just some protection.

name: Welding Mask
description: A thick, heavy mask worn when working with intense heat

name: Work Gloves
description: Sturdy work gloves that protect your hands against physical, electric, and heat damage

name: Thick Rubber Gloves
description: Thick rubber gloves for dangerous electrical work

name: Black Leather Gloves
description: Some protection, but mostly worn to look like an evil badass
